StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetContrac.ngGoalForDistrict]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FiscalYear int, @District as int AS
SELECT CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID, CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE, MONTH_CODE.MONTH_CODE, MISSION_VALUE, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.SHORT_NAME FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION INNER JOIN CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN ON RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID = CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP ON RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID = ORGANIZATION_MAP.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MONTH_CODE ON CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN.MONTH_CODE = MONTH_CODE.MONTH_CODE WHERE CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RS' AND ORGANIZATION_MAP.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @District AND MONTH_CODE.MONTH_CODE > 0 --- The CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE is ordered by the last digit to display it in the correct order on the interface ORDER BY RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ISOPEN DESC, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.SHORT_NAME, RIGHT(CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE, 1), MONTH_CODE.DISPLAY_ORDER --CSB changed sort order --ORDER BY CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID, RIGHT(CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE, 1), MONTH_CODE.DISPLAY_ORDER
